page.title: 07Crime
page.content:
The crime level in this area seems low and the majority of crimes petty. Now and again you hear of a big fight in Flint, but the most common crimes are shop-lifting or breaking into shops or houses. There is some vandalism such as breaking the school windows or writing on walls, but on the whole Flint is quite a safe place to live in.
There was a murder committed about five years ago, the victim was only fourteen years old. Most people have forgotton about this.
When I read the local paper each evening I cannot find many articles about serious crime, this is how I know there is mostly petty crime in this area.
